import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { KTSVG, toAbsoluteUrl } from '_metronic/helpers' import { AccountModel } from 'app/modules/users/models/Account' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {actions} from '../../redux/AccountRedux' import moment from 'moment' import {date} from "yup"; import {round} from "@popperjs/core/lib/utils/math"; type Props = { item: AccountModel, index:number } const UserItem : React.FC = ({ item ,index}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const clickHandler =()=>{ dispatch(actions.showCurrentAccount(item)) } const clickDeleteHandler = () => { if (window.confirm("Bạn chắc chắn muốn xóa VPS IP: "+item.username!) == true) { dispatch(actions.deleteVpsRequest(item.username)) } } return (
{ dispatch(actions.checkedChange({ username:item.username, checked:evt.target.checked })) }} className='form-check-input' type='checkbox' value={1} checked={item.checked} data-kt-check='true' data-kt-check-target='.widget-13-check' />
{index+1}
{item.username}
{item.role}
Reset {item.balance}
) } export default UserItem
